name: Mrs. MODIFIER
description:
Entry for the GMTK Jam 2021 "Joined Together".

Classic platformer "Mrs. MODIFIER" has been installed in an arcade cabinet with only 3 buttons!  

Controls: 

[Left Arrow] / [A]

[Right Arrow] / [D]

[X] / [Up Arrow] / [W]

Press [`] or [Q] or [Tab] to access the pause menu

Other controls are indicated in-game.

If the Web build is slow, consider downloading the Windows build linked below!

Created by:

Walaber, Chad Cable, and secret contributor(s)

Music by Eric Matyas

www.soundimage.org

*** Spoiler below that explains how we implemented the theme ***

You might need to modify the game from time to time by "joining together" multiple actions onto the same button in order to progress.
